column1: Counsel: Nihara Renakiya for the Accused – Petitioner.
Indika Nelummini SC for the State.

(Presently at Walikada Prison): instant  application  has  been  filed  to  set  aside  the  order  dated

column1: 2.3.2022 of the High Court of Colombo in which bail has been refused to
the accused namely Mallawaarrachhige Samantha Nandana Kumara.
The accused in the instant matter had been remanded for the possession
of 4.26 grams of pure quantity of heroin under the provisions of Poisons
Opium and Dangerous Drugs act and has been indicted for the same and
